prompts: Create an electric-type bird Pokemon with vibrant yellow feathers and sharp black accents.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon with lightning powers, soaring through stormy skies with grace.
Design a mythical creature that embodies the spirit of thunder, with striking wings and agile movements.
Generate a Pokemon that can harness electricity, featuring unique talons and a fierce gaze.
Show me a flying Pokemon that commands respect with its electrifying presence and sharp beak.
Make a Pokemon with a sleek body, capable of swift aerial maneuvers and powerful electric attacks.
Give me a design of a rare bird Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions and can summon storms.
